Title: Establishes a twenty-four hour, toll-free hotline and website for runaway and homeless youth
Summary: Establishes a twenty-four hour, toll-free hotline and website for runaway and homeless youth that provides immediate support, referrals, resource lists and other information to such youth.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a twenty-four hour, toll-free hotline and website for runaway and homeless youth
